page.title: 06GETTING ON OUR HOBBY HORSES
page.content: Of all the days in the week Friday is my favourite,for this is the day when Primary 7 classes have their {Hobbies {Time at Dalmilling Primary School.}All the pupils may choose to take part in gardening,woodwork,macrame,painting or working with computers.So far this year I have taken part in working with computers,macrame and painting.I liked computer work most of all _ especially the space invader games! Some of our boys,who like gardening have "taken over" the garden of one of the pensioners who lives close to our school. After digging and getting the ground ready,they have planted vegetables and flowers.This type of {community work}has given the boys a great feeling of achievement.At the end of term we are having a barbecue in our "adopted garden"_thanks to the kindness of a friendly pensioner.
